definition: li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
there/that place/also written 那裡|那里
where?/somewhere/anywhere/wherever/nowhere (negative answer to question)/humble expression denying compliment/also written 哪裡|哪里
no ivory comes from the mouth of a dog (idiom)/no good words are to be expected from a scoundrel
pinyin: gou3 zui3 li5 tu3 bu4 chu1 xiang4 ya2

definition: erotic animation/hentai/(loanword from Japanese 裏番組 "ura bangumi")

sentences.english: They could even count the fruit in Soviet orchards and analyze their crops.
sentences.chinese: 他們甚至可以數出蘇聯果園裏的果樹並分析其產量。

sentences.english: To me, in the love of the river, I often feel like I was upstream .
sentences.chinese: 於我，在愛情的河流裏，我經常覺得自己在逆流而上。

sentences.english: There is also a Children's Corner in our zoo.
sentences.chinese: 動物園裏還有個兒童樂園。

sentences.english: Perhaps they spent time in the yard.
sentences.chinese: 也許他們在院子裏打發時光。

sentences.english: While it was a great day, I got a bit sunburned in the water.
sentences.chinese: 今天過得很棒，但我在水裏把自己給曬傷了。

sentences.english: Place the rice noodles in a large bowl, and cover with warm water.
sentences.chinese: 把米線放進一個大碗裏，然後用溫水浸泡。

sentences.english: In those days we did not need spies to watch the enemy's movement .
sentences.chinese: 在那些日子裏，我們不需要情報員注意敵人動向。

sentences.english: However, Toni, who knows Ribery well, believes the Bianconeri should sign him.
sentences.chinese: 然而託尼很瞭解裏貝里，並且相信尤文會簽下他。

sentences.english: His body was found in the Floor hole.
sentences.chinese: 他的軀體發現在樓棟裏。

sentences.english: Poetry prophecy is an exotic flower in remote mountains which is in full bloom in our Chinese classics hundred-flower garden.
sentences.chinese: 詩讖是盛開在中國古典文學百花園裏的一株深山奇葩。

sentences.english: For the past few days, there has instead been rioting in the square.
sentences.chinese: 在過去的幾天裏，廣場上沒有垃圾，倒是有一場暴亂。

sentences.english: A young boy descends into a saphire mine in southern Madagascar.
sentences.chinese: 一個小男孩下到馬達加斯加南部的一個藍寶石礦裏。

sentences.english: Shepherd's purse green season, and grandmother would have to accompany her mother to pick the fields shepherd's purse.
sentences.chinese: 薺菜青青時節，外婆便要母親陪着去田野裏挑薺菜。

sentences.english: Our supplies for this month are in the cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 我們這個月的生活用品在櫥子裏。

sentences.english: The cunning thief stole the money out of the man's pocket.
sentences.chinese: 狡滑的小偷從那位男士的口袋裏偷了錢。

sentences.english: He heard the contents of the glass being poured into the sink .
sentences.chinese: 他聽到杯中物被倒進水盆裏。

definition: variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
suffix of a noun of locality
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
